It's Cerulean, your favoriate competitor, and it doesn't look like she's much the worse for wear! A little scuffed up in places, perhaps, but her huge snakelike form seems all right. She notices you looking over her, and chuckles. "Worried about me? Guess you missed the match, they had me against some big tropical snakes. Bit of a coil on coil thing I suppose..." She burps a bit, one of her relatively delicate paws covering her muzzle. "They... didn't agree with me, I think, and I've been in the ladies room for a while."

With another pat to your back, she pets your stunned muzzle. "Well, are you going to stand there, or are you going to ask me to go do something? I'm still all worked up after that match, I could use a bit of company to wind down with."

This is certainly the chance of a life time, getting to spend some time with essentially a dragon celebrity!

A fire dragon's lair tends towards drier, warmer climates than that of a water dragon, something you forgot to consider! Still Cerulean doesn't seem to mind or complaign; she's made of sterner stuff than that. On the way back to your place she tells you a little about herself; originally she started in the tournaments on a crazy bet with some friends, and it just sort of turned into a regular thing. Hunting is thrilling, you certainly enjoy the rush in your own combats, and Cerulean enjoys hers! The league gives her an outlet for larger and more exotic hunts than she'd get normally, at increased personal risk.

So that's how you find yourself smiling at a dragoness several times your size over a drink and bit of light late-night snack in your lair. Her powerful coiled body fills up a good bit of your main chamber, lying loose across the floor while you talk a little about your own interests, particularly in watching her fight. "Sometimes," you admit. "I almost wish it was me being squeezed in your coils..."

You're cut off by a massive snout pressing against your own, and the flick of a wet, slick tongue between your jaws as Cerulean pushes into a fierce kiss with you. "I think you're going to find out, cutie..."
